Select a puzzle: Settings Skip Done Across Down Anagram remaining letters: Anagram solution: Board: Scratch: Notes: Tap to show full notes. Tap to hide full notes. Please wait... Copy Conflict Transferring the response conflicts with existing entries. Overwrite anyway? YES NO Reveal Entire Puzzle Are you sure? OK Cancel Elapsed Time: %1$s Allow Permissions Please allow writing to storage when prompted. Forkyz needs this permission to store downloaded crossword files and cannot work without it. Downloads Notifications about downloaded puzzles Online X Preview Unable to download from\n%1$s Puzzle %1$s already exists Error downloading puzzle %1$s Error parsing puzzle %1$s Puzzle %1$s downloaded successfully
Storage Location Configure where Forkyz stores/finds its files. Restart app after change. App Internal Storage External directory (Android 5 and above)$ (Current: %1$s) no directory selected External SD crosswords directory (legacy, Android 10 and previous) Storage location changed. Please restart Forkyz. Select Puzzle Sources Daily Crosswords Puzzles which update daily. Weekly Crosswords Puzzles which update weekly. Experimental Sources May or may not function correctly. Application Settings Fit to screen when starting Best-fits the puzzle when you start. Automatic Download Download today\'s puzzles when starting the application Download new puzzles in background Periodically download new puzzles in the background, even when Forkyz is not in use. Background Download Options Configure background downloads. No Download Notifications Prevents a notification for each puzzle downloaded from appearing in the notifications list. No Hint Highlighting Prevents the pink boxes indicating \'hints\' in the form of reveals or show errors. Delete on Cleanup Delete rather than archive old puzzles Cleanup Unfinished Determines how old an unfinished puzzle must be before it is archived/deleted. Cleanup Archives Determines how old an archived puzzle must be before it is deleted. Show/Hide In-App Keyboard The show/hide behaviour of the in-app keyboard. Snap to Current Word Toggles the auto-scrolling of the playboard to the current play position Show Length Shows the number of letters in the answer on the clue line Scroll To Clue Toggles the auto-scrolling to the selected clue in the clues list. (Works like Forkyz 1) Movement Style Select what happens when you type past the end of a word. Skip Filled Boxes Toggles the skipping of filled boxes when you enter a new letter. Preserve Correct Boxes when Showing Errors Keeps you from overwriting a correct box when you are in \'Show Errors\' mode. Space Changes Direction Spacebar changed direction rather than blanking the box. Enter Changes Direction Enter changes direction rather than moving to the next clue. Double Tap Zoom Double tap toggles between fit to screen, and your default zoom. Show Timer Shows your puzzle time.\nYou must leave and re-enter a puzzle to apply. Full Screen Hides the notification bar.\nYou must leave and re-enter a puzzle to apply. Orientation Lock Locks the screen location Disable Swipe Disables swiping to dismiss on the list view. Swipe Action Select delete or archive on swipe Display Scratch Display scratch notes on play board. Don\'t delete crossing words When deleting, don\'t delete a letter if it is part of a filled-in crossing word About Forkyz Release Notes License
Download over Wifi only Only schedule background downloads when Wifi is available. Schedule background downloads even when not on Wifi Download when roaming Schedule background downloads when roaming Do not schedule background downloads when roaming Download while charging only Only schedule background downloads when charging Schedule background downloads when on battery
